titleStmt.title: Chorus poetarum, or, Poems on several occasions by the Duke of Buckingham, the late Lord Rochester, Sir John Denham, Sir Geo. Etheridge, Andrew Marvel, Esq., the famous Spencer, Madam Behn, and several other eminent poets of this age.
titleStmt.author: Buckingham, George Villiers, Duke of, 1628-1687.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
